name: nif
title: NIF - Portugal Tax Number Lookup
description: Search and verify Tax Identification Number (NIF) for Portuguese companies.
author: rgllm

commands.name: nif
commands.title: Search NIF
commands.description: Search and verify Tax Identification Number (NIF) for Portuguese companies.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
